title: [Massive] Immersive Virtual Reality-Based Science Learning Design Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic scientific concepts and experience using digital devices
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing immersive virtual reality-based learning activities for science education for the general public. Considers the balance between technological accessibility and educational effectiveness.

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more interaction strategies for understanding science concepts in an immersive virtual reality environment.
Learners can classify types of virtual reality learning activities into five categories using cluster analysis techniques.
Learners can propose balanced design plans for physical presence and pedagogical engagement elements.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
